select last_insert_id()
insert into epidemic.clock_in(stu_school,stu_id, stu_name, stu_address, stu_class, stu_tmp, is_out, stu_des, stu_out, stu_back, clock_date) VALUES (#{stu_school},#{stu_id},#{stu_name},#{stu_address},#{stu_class},#{stu_tmp},#{is_out},#{stu_des},#{stu_out},#{stu_back},#{clock_date})
